issue.title: C++: Fix handling of empty strings
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-75](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-75). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
If StringBuilder.Append() is given a byte array with length 0 (such as if a user calls pyarrow.from_pylist([""])), it segfaults.
